channel.title: +तडिपत्रि-केशवः on माध्व-मते विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +तडिपत्रि-केशवः on माध्व-मते विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: Vishi Sh T Advaita vishle Sha Na vivechanam
item.description:
Source: TW

विश्वास-टिप्पनी

अस्य प्रत्युक्तिर् अन्यत्र - TW।

Shri Kesava Rao Tadipatri

viśiṣṭādvaita viśleṣaṇa

viślesana vivecanam

Introduction:

have great

At the very outset, I would like to point out that admiration for Sri Rāmānuja that when the ever confusing points of Advaita were ruling, he made tremendous progress in pointing out the many flaws in there, by founding Visiṣṭādvaita. However due to the will of the Lord some of the newer concepts introduced themselves are not aligned with shashtras.

item.title: Vishi Sh T Advaita vishle Sha Na vivechanam
item.description:
Source: TW

Shri Kesava Rao Tadipatri
viśistādvaita viślesana vivecanam

Introduction

At the very outset, I would like to point out that have great admiration for Sri Rāmānuja that when the ever confusing points of Advaita were ruling, he made tremendous progress in pointing out the many flaws in there, by founding Viśiṣṭādvaita. However due to the will of the Lord some of the newer concepts introduced themselves are not aligned with shashtras.
